title: 39 Day Lifescape-Become a Better You
description: What is a lifescape?Lifescape(n.) 1. The landscape of your life's evolution. 2. Escape into the life you really want3. Your life’s narrativeHow would you like to escape into a life where all of your real needs are met and all of your real life goals come into clear focus? Where self-esteem rises and misdirection is kept to a minimum as your choices start becoming more focused and less scattered? Does that sound good? If your answer is yes, I totally agree! The 39 Days to Your New Lifescape contains a series of challenges that promote creating a life of purpose through personal development, business and self-fulfillment. There is also a workbook of activities that corresponds with each new day, encouraging you to push at the boundaries you’ve set in your life so that you are able to make changes that fulfill you personally and professionally.
author: jaha Knight
